rule: Key words and phrases should refer to unimportant or random words within the sentence.
input: Markets fluctuate daily. Stocks go up. Investments carry risk.
validityText:
The input is a paragraph of text containing three separate sentences: "Markets fluctuate daily.", "Stocks go up.", and "Investments carry risk.". According to the input specification, the input should be a paragraph of text that contains at least three sentences. The provided input meets these criteria, as it is a paragraph composed of exactly three complete sentences. There are no violations of the input specification.

OK
